title: Dr Nadeem condemns terrorist attack in DI Khan
content:
ISLAMABAD, Dec 12 (APP):Caretaker Federal Minister for Health Dr Nadeem Jan on Tuesday strongly condemned the terrorist attack in Dera Ismail Khan.
In a message, he said, “I express my condolences to the families of those who were martyred in the attack. Martyrs are the pride of our country.”
He prayed that may Allah Almighty rest the departed souls in eternal peace and give patience to their family members.
Dr Nadeem Jan said that we have contacted the Provincial Health Minister and the Chief Minister and offered treatment facilities in federal hospitals for the injured.
Dr Nadeem Jan said that our hospital will be on alert for blood donations to treat the injured.
